text: (napiye! Avarkalai nokki) kuruviraka: ‘‘Vetattai utaiyavarkale! Namakkum unkalukkum oru camattuvamana visayattin pakkam varuvirkalaka! (Atavatu) nam allahvait tavira veronraiyum vanankamattom. Nam avanukku etaiyum inaiyakkamattom. Nam'mil oruvarum allahvait tavira evaraiyum iraivanaka etuttuk kollamattom'' (enru kurunkal. Nampikkaiyalarkale! Itaiyum) avarkal purakkanittal ‘‘niccayamaka nankal muslimkal (avan oruvanukke valippattavarkal) enru ninkal catci kurunkal!'' Enru ninkal kurivitunkal
